RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 55. Maiden Special Weight Purse 34000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BOHEMIAN JIGGLES broke back, moved up closer on the outside into the turn, stalked through the turn, engaged the leader when straightened for home, extended duel to the finish, proved best while trying to lug in late. CUSTOM SUNSHINE broke to the inside forcing LONG LEGGED LADY into SARAH'S COURT, was quickly straightened to clear early, continued to show the way through the turn, responded when confronted by the winner in upper stretch, dueled with that one to the wire and proved stubborn to the end. JAYDYN CAT within striking distance along the inside for three furlongs, shifted out a bit for the drive, proved no match for the top two. LONG LEGGED LADY bumped by the runner up then ducked in at the break causing SARAH'S COURT to check up, was straightened and turned in an even effort in lacking a closing response. SARAH'S COURT cut off then checked up at the break, fell far back, continued to lag through the turn and into the stretch, displayed some late interest after the issue had been decided. C C LLAM void of speed, faded through the lane to finish well back. FOLLOWING A STEWARDS' INQUIRY REGARDING THE START, NO ACTION WAS TAKEN.

ENTRY.NAME: Jaydyn Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance inside, no match top two

ENTRY.NAME: C C Llam
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, faded stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Sarah's Court
ENTRY.COMMENT: cut off, checked up break, late interest

ENTRY.NAME: Long Legged Lady
ENTRY.OWNER: Bruno Jr Gerald Deville Carl J Our Blue Streaks Stable and Pomier Chasey Deville
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped, ducked in start, back off the pace, one paced

ENTRY.NAME: Custom Sunshine
ENTRY.OWNER: Bruno Jr Gerald Deville Carl J and Our Blue Streaks Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, quickly straightened, sprinted clear, stubborn

ENTRY.NAME: Bohemian Jiggles
ENTRY.COMMENT: closer early outside, bid upper, extended duel, best, lugged

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 69. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 35000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $50,000 WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACE. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming At A Mile Or Over Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $50,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FOR HARPER unhurried early toward the inside, inched closer in the second flight far turn, steered out three wide when moving to challenge entering the stretch, took over and quickly drove clear. SHES A LUCKY REBEL broke on top, showed the way into the far turn, dueled the middle half mile closest to the inside, proved no match for the winner through the lane, remained clear for the place. STARSHIP JAMBALAYA broke out to bother THE CALLING STONE, was quickly straightened to move up and challenge the runner up early in the first turn, continued to alternate for the advantage up the backstretch and through the final turn, gradually weakened but managed to save the show. THE CALLING STONE broke in the air then was bothered to be las away, moved up to race on the outside, continued well out in the strip to be four wide through the second bend when with the main body, went evenly through the lane in lacking a closing kick. MUCHMORETHANREADY settled off the pace, continued evenly into the final turn, had little for the stretch drive. WORLD OF HURT fell back to trail after the start, never a threat. TENSAS BERTIE chased the dueling leaders early and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Tensas Bertie
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased duel, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: For Harper
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early,2nd flight final turn,steered3w,bid,quickly clear

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Clear Creek Stud LLC & Theodore Brandon

ENTRY.NAME: World of Hurt
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Muchmorethanready
ENTRY.OWNER: Dare To Dream Stable LLC (Michael Faber)
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off the pace, little left drive

ENTRY.NAME: Shes a Lucky Rebel
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled up front inside, no match winner, stayed clear 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Starship Jambalaya
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, straightened to advance, dueled 2p, saved show

ENTRY.NAME: The Calling Stone
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in air, bothered, 4w 2nd turn, evenly drive

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 1M Turf CR: 70. Maiden Special Weight Purse 34000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CREEKSIDE broke alertly from along the inside, showed the way into the first turn while under some pressure, rated kindly in the run up the backstretch, continued to hold the advantage through the second bend, kicked clear when straightened for home and maintained daylight to the wire. UP N GONE broke in to help jam a pair of inner rivals, settled in mid pack off the rail, four wide through the second turn, roused for the drive, rallied to be edging clear for the place late while still well out in the course, not a serious threat to the winner. RACY BILLE away in good order, prompted the issue early three wide and in hand, continued in a forward position the middle half mile, chased the winner through upper stretch and past the furlong marker, could do little with that one, caught for the place. SPIRIT OF DREAMS forced back at the break, recovered to advance and race within striking distance toward the inside, continued in the second flight up the backstraight, in some traffic far turn, came up empty when clear for the drive. SEA OF LIGHT broke out to help jam a couple of outer foes, was straightened, pressed that one from the outside for six furlongs and began to weaken, continued to falter through the stretch. ZIPPY TOGA lacked early foot while outside, four to five wide through the second turn, lacked a serious rally down the lane. OUR HEATSEEKER jammed back at the break, trailed early as a result and made little impact. POPPA BEAR finished early in trailing most of the way.

ENTRY.NAME: Creekside
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, pace, rated kindly, kicked clear

ENTRY.NAME: Sea of Light
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,pressed winner 2p, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Our Heatseeker
ENTRY.OWNER: Hernandez Earl J Hernandez Keith J and Duvieilh John
ENTRY.COMMENT: jammed break, trailed, little impact

ENTRY.NAME: Spirit of Dreams
ENTRY.COMMENT: forced back break, traffic 2nd turn, empty drive

ENTRY.NAME: Up N Gone
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, mid pack, raced outside 4w 2nd turn, rallied 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Poppa Bear
ENTRY.COMMENT: was finished early, trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Racy Bille
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace 3w and in hand, chased upper, caught 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Zippy Toga
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked early foot outside, 4-5w 2nd turn, lacked serious rally

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 58. Maiden Special Weight Purse 34000. For Accredited La Bred Maidens, Two Years Old Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STRONG PROMISE lacked early foot, steered out and swept up strongly to challenge five wide into the lane, quickly kicked well clear under his own courage to win going away and ridden out. OVER PAID behind the early leaders along the inside, angled out four wide to challenge turning for home while inside the winner, proved no match for that one in the run to the wire, edged clear for the place. CAJUN CYCLONE pressed the issue early from the outside, vied into the lane three wide, came in to saw JANET'S BROTHER off nearing the furlong grounds, continued to come in to bother HYMN FOR CARLOS slightly, finished up along the inside to be clear of the others. BOBBY BOY restless in the gate then broke in the air, steadied to spot the field a couple of lengths, continued to trail out of the turn, showed some belated interest to improve position the final furlong. DEAL WITH IT DADDY broke in to bother JANET'S BROTHER, raced back, four wide into the lane, passed a couple of tiring rivals while not a threat. JANET'S BROTHER bothered at the break, recovered to race forwardly into the turn, vied between rivals into the stretch, was sawed off with just over a furlong remaining and fell back. HYMN FOR CARLOS showed the way early along the inside, continued to race with the lead pack out of the turn, was tiring when put in a bit tight by CAJUN CLYCLONE a furlong out, continued to weaken. FOLLOWING A STEWARDS' INQUIRY REGARDING THE RUN THROUGH THE STRETCH AND A CLAIM OF FOUL BY THE RIDER OF JANET'S BROTHER AGAINST CAJUN CYCLONE FOR INTERFERENCE PAST THE FURLONG MARKER, THE LATER WAS DISQUALIFIED FROM THIRD AND PLACED SIXTH.

ENTRY.NAME: Strong Promise
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked early foot, swept up 5w, strongly clear

ENTRY.NAME: Over Paid
ENTRY.COMMENT: behind leaders inside, angled 4w late turn, no match, clear 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Bobby Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: restless gate, broke in air, steadied, trailed, belated interest

ENTRY.NAME: Hymn for Carlos
ENTRY.OWNER: Bruno Jr Gerald Deville Carl J and Our Blue Streaks Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: showed way early, tiring when bothered slightly 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Janet's Brother
ENTRY.OWNER: Bruno Jr Gerald Deville Carl J and Our Blue Streaks Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: bothered at the break, moved up, vied btwn, sawed off 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Deal With It Daddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, lacked early foot, 4w into lane, passed tiring foes

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Cajun Cyclone
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed outside, came in, sawed off foe 1/8

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Louisiana Legends Turf Distaff S. EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 1M Turf CR: 101. Stakes Purse 100000. FOR ACCREDITED LOUISIANA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Free to nominate with $500 to enter and $500 to start. Supplemental nominations of $2000 will be accepted at time of entries which shall include all fees. $100,000 Guaranteed t o be divided per condition book stake structure payout percentages per field size. Weights: Three-year-olds 118 lbs. Older 123 lbs. Winners of $60,000 twice since November 1, 2022, to carry additional 2 lbs. Non winners of $60,000 at one mile or over s ince Dec. 4, 2022, allowed 3 lbs., such a race of $30,000 since Feb. 4, 2023, 5 lbs., a race other than maiden, claiming or starter at one mile or over since March 4, 2023, 7 lbs. Preference to horses with the highest total earnings in 2022-2023 at timeo f entry. Different owners and same owner entries will have equal draw according to preference. Failure to draw into race cancels all fees. Trophy to winning owner and breeder.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHEAPSKATE DIVA moved up to race closest to the leader before a quarter, prompted that one through some legit fractions up the backstretch, moved to engage that rival into the lane, dueled briefly in upper stretch then took over, steadily increased advantage to the wire while kept to pressure. A G'S CHARLOTTE off a step slow, raced back, moved closer toward the inside second turn, steered out and came three wide for the drive, rallied to chase the winner late, fully extended to gain the nod for the runner up position at the wire. WHOLELOTTAMO balked at loading, void of speed while racing off the inside, asked for run while four wide far turn, advanced into the lane, late bid for the place spot, missed. EVE'S DELIGHT moved up to take control into the first turn, clear onto the backstretch, set a solid set of fractions then began to weaken when headed by the winner entering the stretch while inside that one. FORT POLK moved out to race four wide with the main group first turn, continued off the pace, failed to mount a rally. MISHPACHAH broke on top, raced forwardly for a half then faltered. SCARLET STORM was finished after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Mishpachah
ENTRY.OWNER: Coteau Grove Farms LLC Yarmuth William and Yarmuth Susan
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, within striking distance for a half, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Eve's Delight
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved up to take control, solid pace, weakened inside

ENTRY.NAME: Scarlet Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: finished after half

ENTRY.NAME: A G's Charlotte
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, raced back, closer inside, 3w into lane, held 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Fort Polk
ENTRY.OWNER: Roe Steve D and Roe Patricia L
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved out, 4w first turn, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Cheapskate Diva
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted legit pace 2p,bid, dueled,took over, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Wholelottamo
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, asked 4w 2nd, late bid 2nd,missed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Louisiana Legends Mademoiselle S. EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 93. Stakes Purse 100000. FOR ACCREDITED LOUISIANA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Free to nominate with $500 to enter and $500 to start. Supplemental nominations of $2000 will be accepted at time of entries which shall include all fees. $100,000 Guaranteed to be divided per condition book stake structure payout percentages per field size. Weights: Three-year-olds 118 lbs. Older 123 lbs. Winners of $60,000 twice since Dec. 1, 2022, to carry additional 2 lbs. Non winners of $45,000 since Dec. 1, 2022, allowe d 3 lbs., a race other than maiden, claiming or starter since March 1, 2023, 5 lbs., such a race since 2023 7 lbs. Preference to horses with the highest total earnings in 2022-2023 at time of entry. Different owners and same owner entries will have equa l draw according to preference. Failure to draw into race cancels all fees. Trophy to winning owner and breeder.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FREE LIKE A GIRL in some early traffic, moved closer four wide into the turn, continued to trim the margin of the leaders through the bend, saw that progress stall in upper stretch, briskly roused, late surge to win going away at the end. BELEOUT in the second flight off the inside, advanced and challenged the leader late in the turn, put a head in front when straightened for home, proved no match for the winner late, held sway for the place. FIRST I'VE SEEN in mid pack inside the winner early, fell back a bit turn, came three wide for the drive, rallied to be clear for the show. NONEYA popped stall doors prior to the start when fractious, last to leave, came wide for the drive, staged a belated rally to improve position. FINAL QUEST back off the early pace, moved closer along the inside turn, flattened out in the drive. WUPKAR broke sharp, cleared toward the inside in showing the way up the backstretch and into the turn, briefly dueled with the runner up late in the bend then faltered. SNOWBALL remained back in failing to menace. FLASHY MEG forwardly placed in the early going, began a steady retreat before three furlongs.

ENTRY.NAME: Noneya
ENTRY.COMMENT: popped stall doors, last away, widest, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Final Quest
ENTRY.COMMENT: off early pace, closer along rail turn, flattened out drive

ENTRY.NAME: Flashy Meg
ENTRY.COMMENT: briefly forward, steady retreat

ENTRY.NAME: First I've Seen
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack while between foes early, 3w into lane, late rally show

ENTRY.NAME: Free Like a Girl
ENTRY.OWNER: Bruno Jr Gerald Deville Carl J Pomier Chasey Deville and Caroom Jerry
ENTRY.COMMENT: early traffic, closer 4w into turn, stalled upper, late surge

ENTRY.NAME: Snowball
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained back in failing to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Beleout
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd fight off rail, bid, took over, no match late

ENTRY.NAME: Wupkar
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharp, cleared, dueled, faltered

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Louisiana Legends Cheval S. EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 84. Stakes Purse 100000. FOR ACCREDITED LOUISIANA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS. Free to nominate with $500 to enter and $500 to start. Supplemental nominations of $2000 will be accepted at time of entries which shall include all fees. $100,000 Guaranteed to be divided per condition bo ok stake structure payout percentages per field size. Weights: 123 lbs. Non winners of a sweepstakes at one mile or over allowed 3 lbs., a race other than maiden, claiming or starter at one mile or over 5 lbs., non-winners other than maiden or claimin g 7 lbs. Preference to horses with the highest total earnings in at time of entry. Different owners and same owner entries will have equal draw according to preference. Failure to draw into race cancels all fees. Trophy to winning owner and breeder.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ALLNIGHT MOONLIGHT close from the start outside, four wide through the first turn, continued to prompt the pace outside, four wide again second turn when moving to challenge, dueled into the lane, long drive, fully extended in a determined effort. MANGUM also forwardly placed from the beginning, three wide, bid between foes and inside the winner second turn, gained a narrow advantage, dueled the length of the stretch inside the winner, proved stubborn to the end. THE BOSS SOSS leaned into the gate at the break, rider lost right iron, lacked speed, between foes into the lane, rallied to be clear for the show, not a threat to the top two. CLEAR AS A BELE one paced off rail in lacking a closing response. REDDINGANDLEE fell back to trail, lagged for six furlongs, passed some tiring rivals to improve position, never a serious threat. CALIBRACHOA KID broke alertly, clear the opening quarter, showed the way up the backstretch and into the far turn while off the inside, faltered when headed by the top two midway on that bend. MACHO BEANIE closest to the early leader, chased that one up the backstretch, lodged a brief bid along the inside second turn and gave way. KAJUN KARMA in mid pack early, had little for the drive. Z'S GUITAR was finished early, back.

ENTRY.NAME: Kajun Karma
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, had little for the drive

ENTRY.NAME: Clear as a Bele
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced off rail, no late bid

ENTRY.NAME: The Boss Soss
ENTRY.COMMENT: leaned into gate, lost iron start, back, rallied, no match top 2

ENTRY.NAME: Calibrachoa Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, clear early 2p, faltered when headed

ENTRY.NAME: Z's Guitar
ENTRY.COMMENT: finished early, back

ENTRY.NAME: Macho Beanie
ENTRY.OWNER: Oak Tree Stables LLC (Powell and O'Brien)
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, bid 2nd turn, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Mangum
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed 3w, bid, led, long duel, stubborn

ENTRY.NAME: Allnight Moonlight
ENTRY.COMMENT: close from start outside, 4w turns, bid,long drive,determined

ENTRY.NAME: Reddingandlee
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, lagged, passed tiring one

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Louisiana Legends Soiree S. EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 82. Stakes Purse 100000. FOR ACCREDITED LOUISIANA BRED FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Free to nominate with $500 to enter and $500 to start. Supplemental nominations of $2000 will be accepted at time of entries which shall include all fees. $100,000 Guaranteed to be divided per cond ition book stake structure payout percentages per field size. Weights: 122 lbs. Non winners of a sweepstakes at one mile or over allowed 3 lbs., a race other than maiden, claiming or starter at one mile or over 5 lbs., non-winners other than maiden orc laiming 7 lbs. Preference to horses with the highest total earnings in at time of entry. Different owners and same owner entries will have equal draw according to preference. Failure to draw into the race cancels all fees. Trophy to winning owner and b reeder.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOUISIANA LIBERTY lacked speed while four wide through the first turn, continued to lack speed while outside in the run up the backstretch, four wide advance second bend, outside bid in upper stretch, wore down rivals to prove best. STAR MOMENT five wide into the first turn, moved closer before a half, prompted the leader far turn, tried that one from the outside exiting that bend, vied between rivals past the furlong marker, gave ground grudgingly to the winner late. HIGHLY WICKED took command after the start, clear onto the backstretch, set a moderate pace off the inside, responded when challenged second turn, continued to battle on through upper stretch then gradually weakened the final furlong, remained well clear of the others. CRYSTAL D'ORO lacked early speed, improved position three wide while not a threat to the top three. STRAWBERRY SUNDAE went one paced throughout in lacking a closing response. SIXTH ANNIVERSARY within striking distance for five furlongs, had little left for the drive. NEW DESTINY chased the leader early then gave way after five furlongs. I BEAR ARMS was finished after half.

ENTRY.NAME: Highly Wicked
ENTRY.OWNER: Hernandez Earl J Hernandez Keith J and Duvieilh John
ENTRY.COMMENT: took command after start, pace 2p, clear rest

ENTRY.NAME: Sixth Anniversary
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, had little left for the drive

ENTRY.NAME: Strawberry Sundae
ENTRY.OWNER: Tompkins Richard Anthony and Reeves Kathy
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced throughout in lacking a late bid

ENTRY.NAME: I Bear Arms
ENTRY.COMMENT: finished after half

ENTRY.NAME: Crystal d'Oro
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked early foot, improved, no threat top three

ENTRY.NAME: New Destiny
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Louisiana Liberty
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, 4w 1st turn, 4w gain 2nd, outside bid,wore dwn foes

ENTRY.NAME: Star Moment
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5w 7/8, forwardly, bid 2nd, led btwn calls, grudgingly btwn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Louisiana Legends Turf S. EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 9 1 1/16M Turf CR: 103. Stakes Purse 100000. FOR ACCREDITED LOUISIANA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Free to nominate with $500 to enter and $500 to start. Supplemental nominations of $2000 will be accepted at time of entries, which shall include all fees. $100,000 guaranteed to be divided per con dition book stake structure payout percentages per field size. Weights: Three year olds 118 lbs., Older: 123 lbs. Winners of $60,000 twice since November 1, 2022 to carry an additional 2 lbs. Non-winners of $60,000 at a mile or over since Dec. 1, 2022, al lowed 3 lbs., such a race of $30,000 since Feb. 4, 2023, 5 lbs., a race other than maiden, claiming, or starter at a mile or over since March 4, 2023, 7 lbs. Preference to horses with the highest total earnings 2022-2023 at time of entry. Different owners and same owner entries will have equal draw according to preference. Failure to draw into the race cancels all fees. Trophy to winning owner and breeder.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WOODS N WATER forwardly placed out of the chute inside, continued to race forwardly while saving ground the middle half, tentatively ridden to move closer second turn, hit a seam between foes turning for home, set down for the drive, dueled past the furlong marker, edged away late under steady handling. BUDRO TALKING outrun in the early going, continued to lag into the far turn, fanned six wide turning into the straight, rallied willingly to annex the place. DEER CROSSING bumped lightlyt with HIGHLAND CREEK just after the start, raced in mid pack off the inside, four wide turning for home, also staged a late rally to be in time for the show. CARLEA'S DREAM broke on top, showed the way out of the chute, clear by a quarter, raced in hand up the backstretch and into the far turn, responded when confronted by the winner into the lane, dueled with that one the next furlong then began to cave, lost a couple of more positions late. WICKED ROSE devoid of speed, moved five wide and inside the runner up out of the final turn, finished up evenly in lacking a closing punch. HIGHLAND CREEK light bump after break, settled off the pace and the inside, came up empty for the drive. CITY PARK tucked inside onto the main course out of the chute, continued to save ground, some traffic into lane, lacked a closing bid as well. BLUE CHEESE a bit rank at the start, fell back to trail, picked off a couple of tiring rivals while always outrun. SMARTY ALEX in mid pack most of the way, backed up stretch. DOUBLE ON THE RED chased the leader for six furlongs and stopped. DUE TO TIMER MALFUNCTION. RACE WAS HAND TIMED.

ENTRY.NAME: Carlea's Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: pace, clear early, in hand, dueled, caved late

ENTRY.NAME: Blue Cheese
ENTRY.COMMENT: bit rank start, trailed, passed tiring foes

ENTRY.NAME: Double On the Red
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased for six furlongs, stopped stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Woods N Water
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed inside, sit seam 1/4, dueled, edged away

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Orange Grove Thoroughbreds, Inc. & Richard Painter

ENTRY.NAME: City Park
ENTRY.COMMENT: tucked inside onto main course, saved ground no avail

ENTRY.NAME: Budro Talking
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun early, 6w into lane, willingly for 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Wicked Rose
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, 5w and between foes into lane, even finish

ENTRY.NAME: Deer Crossing
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack off the inside, 4w into lane, up late show

ENTRY.NAME: Highland Creek
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off the pace and the inside, empty drive

ENTRY.NAME: Smarty Alex
ENTRY.OWNER: Reeves Kathy Eleven One Racing Stables LLC and Joe Hackler Racing LP
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack much of the way, backed up stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Louisiana Legends Sprint S. EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 10 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 99. Stakes Purse 100000. FOR ACCREDITED LOUISIANA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Free to nominate with $500 to enter and $500 to start. Supplemental nominations of $2000 will be accepted at time of entries which shall include all fees. $100,000 Guaranteed to be divided per c ondition book stake structure payout percentages per field size. Weights: Three-year-olds 118 lbs. Older 123 lbs. Winners of $60,000 twice since Dec. 1, 2022, to carry additional 2 lbs. Non winners of $45,000 since January 1, 2023, allowed 3 lbs., a ra ce other than maiden, claiming or starter since March 1, 2023, 5 lbs., such a race in 2023 7 lbs. Preference to horses with the highest total earnings in 2022-2023 at time of entry. Different owners and same owner entries will have equal draw according t o preference. Failure to draw into race cancels all fees. Trophy to winning owner and breeder.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BLACK SWORD away in good order from the outside, moved closest to the leader late backstretch, continued to chase that one through most of the turn, bid in the three path turning for home, slight drive, drove clear. BIG CHOPPER broke back, void of speed for a half outside, came five wide into the lane, rallied for the place, not a threat to the winner. GRUNT broke sharp, soon sprinted clear, continued to show the way by daylight through most of the turn, briefly responded when the winner came alongside into the lane then began to weaken, no match for the runner up late, narrowly gained the nod to save the show. MIKE J within striking distance early, raced with the main body between horses turn, went evenly through the lane while just off the inside. BINDING AGREEMENT back off the pace and the inside, three wide and between horses far turn, tight, steadied, fell back midway on the bend, displayed some mild interest late after recovering. X CLOWN last away, trailed, made little impact. BERTIE'S GALAXY back off the early pace, moved closer along the inside turn, flattened out in the drive. MY MAN LOUIE in mid pack pack outside, four wide through the turn, gave way in the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: X Clown
ENTRY.OWNER: BW and HTS Stables LLC and Grudzien Jason G
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, little impact

ENTRY.NAME: Bertie's Galaxy
ENTRY.COMMENT: closer turn inside, flattened

ENTRY.NAME: Mike J
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance early, mid pack btwn foes turn, evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Binding Agreement
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off pace, 3w btwn foes turn, tight,steadied 5/16, mildly

ENTRY.NAME: My Man Louie
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack outside, 4w turn, gave way drive

ENTRY.NAME: Grunt
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharp, soon clear, pace 2p, weakened, nod show

ENTRY.NAME: Big Chopper
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, void of speed, 5w into lane, rallied 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Black Sword
ENTRY.COMMENT: away in good order,closer into turn,3w bid, slight drive,drew clr
